title: Adadaa Adadaa Adada Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam
stanzas:
Adadaa Adadaa Adada Song Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam
#DSP #Siddharth #NaMuthukumar 

Adadaa adadaa adadaa
enai yedho seigiraai
Adadaa adadaa adadaa
en nenjai koigiraai

kanavil neeyum vandhaal
en urakkam kaetkiraai
edhiril neeyum vandhaal
en uyirai kaetkiraai

adi un mugam kandaal
en imai rendum
kaigal thattudhe..

Adadaa adadaa adadaa
enai yedho seigiraai
Adadaa adadaa adadaa
en nenjai koigiraai

neeyum naanum 
ondraai pogum podhu
neelum paadhai innum
vendum endru
nenjam yaengudhadi.

vaanavillaai 
neeyum vandha podhu 
en karuppu vellai
kangal rendum
coloraai maarudhadi.

en veettu poovellaam
un veettu dhisai paarkum
en vaasam un padham
engaenu ketkudhadi.

Adadaa adadaa adadaa
enai yedho seigiraai
Adadaa adadaa adadaa
en nenjai koigiraai

ye vaanam meedhu
odum megamellaam
unadhu uruvam pola
vadivam kaatta
kangal mayangudhadi..

poovilaadum 
pattaampoochi kooda
neeyum nadandhu kondae
parandhu sellum
azhagai rasikkudhu

un seigai ovvondrum
en kadhal arthangal
naalthorum naan serkkum
niyabaga chinnangal

Adadaa adadaa adadaa
enai yedho seigiraai
Adadaa adadaa adadaa
en nenjai koigiraai
